geminiBrandBrief.brandDescription: Crystal Energy is an online store offering a curated selection of natural crystals, handmade jewelry, and spiritual accessories designed to promote personal growth, well-being, and positive energy.
geminiBrandBrief.brandAudience: Individuals interested in personal growth, spirituality, mindfulness, and natural wellness, seeking to enhance their lives with the power of crystals and handmade jewelry.
geminiBrandBrief.brandTone: Empowering, positive, spiritual, supportive, and calming.
geminiBrandBrief.brandMessage: Discover the power of crystals to transform your life.
geminiBrandBrief.topEmailText: Find Your Inner Balance with Natural Crystals

aboutUs.paragraph1: At Crystal Energy, we believe in the transformative power of natural crystals and handmade jewelry to enhance personal and spiritual growth.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our best-selling 'Aurelia' Stainless Steel Bracelet embodies this belief, offering not just beauty but also a connection to positive energy, as reflected in the many testimonials highlighting the uplifting effects of our products.
aboutUs.paragraph3: That all ties into our mission to empower individuals to discover their inner strength and well-being through the unique energies of crystals and meticulously crafted jewelry.

Shipping Method: Standard (5–7 business days)

Delivery Information:
Package expected 7–10 business days from send-out. Tracking will be sent. Processing happens Monday to Friday, not holidays.

Not arrived within timeframe? Support team available. We're ready to help.

1. Processing: Typical timing is 1–2 business days. At high volume, allow 3–5. This is before transit.
2. Shipping & Arrival: Standard delivery may apply to qualifying baskets. Expedited options may show at checkout. Timing depends on method and region.
3. Payment & Security: Transactions encrypted. Details protected. Payment methods shown at checkout.
4. Returns & Resolution: Contact us within 7 days if item is damaged or incorrect. Instructions will follow. Shipping-related amounts may not be refundable if no mistake occurred.
5. Privacy Statement: Info used to manage account and fulfill inquiry. We don't share data unless required.
6. Rights & Content: Materials belong to Crystal Energy or licensed parties. Protected by intellectual property laws.

Thank you again from Crystal Energy. We appreciate your support.

Regards,
The Crystal Energy Team
